lead_paragraph: A university study finds that the chemical weapons, five miles south of Pearl Harbor, pose no hazard but are deteriorating and should be monitored.
snippet: A university study finds that the chemical weapons, five miles south of Pearl Harbor, pose no hazard but are deteriorating and should be monitored.

headline.main: Old Weapons Off Hawaii Should Stay Put, Army Says
headline.seo: Weapons Dumped Off Hawaii Should Remain There, Army Says
headline.print_headline: Old Weapons Off Hawaii Should Stay Put, Army Says
